name: react-hive
description: react-hive is a powerful and lightweight state management solution designed for React. It offers a centralized store, support for middleware, asynchronous actions, and easy state access through custom React hooks. Perfect for managing complex state logic in both small and large-scale applications.

scripts.start: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.clean: rm -rf dist node_modules package-lock.json && npm install

author: Abdul Daim
